Question: His first feature for Universal, You Can't Cheat an Honest Man, carried on the ____-McCarthy rivalry.
Hints: Back in America, this person found that he could get more laughs by adding dialogue to his routines.
This person toured several continents and became a world-class juggler and an international star.
This person embellished stories of his youth, but his home seems to have been a reasonably happy one.
